--- product_code: ls03 description: 10mm Landsknecht Arquebusiers (Handgunners) title: 10mm Landsknecht Arquebusiers (Handgunners) breadcrumb: Arquebusiers (Handgunners) name: Landsknecht Arquebusiers (Handgunners) cost: $10.00 paypal_id: 5Z5L3SQ8UKBTG ---

Landsknechte Doppelsöldner armed with arquebuses (early matchlock firearms) would provide ranged fire support by the flanks of the pike blocks.

This is an Arquebusiers (Handgunners) unit of fifteen strips of two figures each (30 figures total). You will recieve fifteen rank and file strips (a mix of ls03a–e). Bases are not included but are available separately.
